properties.entry: SELECT R.REST_NO , REST_NAME , LOCAL_NAME , MENU_NAME , NVL(ROUND(AVG(REVIEW_RATE)), 0) "REST_AVG" , COUNT(*) "REVIEW_COUNT" , COUNT_LIKE , REST_IMG_URL , LIKE_DATE FROM REST R LEFT JOIN REVIEW RV ON (R.REST_NO = RV.REST_NO) JOIN LOCATION ON (REST_LOCAL_ID = LOCAL_ID) LEFT JOIN MENU M ON (R.REST_NO = M.REST_NO AND M.REP_MENU = 'Y') JOIN ( SELECT REST_NO , LIKE_DATE , COUNT_LIKE FROM HEART JOIN ( SELECT REST_NO , COUNT(*) "COUNT_LIKE" FROM HEART GROUP BY REST_NO ) USING(REST_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ? ) T1 ON (R.REST_NO = T1.REST_NO) WHERE REST_STATUS = 'Y' AND REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY R.REST_NO , REST_NAME , LIKE_DATE , COUNT_LIKE , REST_IMG_URL , LOCAL_NAME , MENU_NAME
